item.description:
Come join us for a simple and light lunch or just have coffee, tea, pastry at Crema Cafe as we chat, get to know each other more and practice our Chinese at Crema Cafe. They serve all kinds of coffee beverages, teas, cocoa, juices, fruit salad, bagels, a variety of sandwiches and salads. All at a very reasonable price. Check out the web site for more details.

It is very close to the Harvard MBTA station and right next door to Bertucci's. JUst go out and accross to HarvardCoop ad around the corner from there is Crema Cafe.

If you click on Crema Cafe above you can then get to the Website.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign up

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Conversation group @ Crema Cafe
